chara.textHome:
I see you've finished packing for
the beach trip.
It's important to enjoy your vacation time...
Hm? Will I enjoy it? Of course.
I've been looking forward to today.
Good morning.

I see you're up bright and early,
even during summer vacation.

You might say it's a given,
but I'm still impressed.

I know it's hot, but you mustn't
only eat cold food.
That's why I prepared curry for our lunch...
It's packed with summer vegetables.

I plan to set up a campfire on
the beach for the sunset.

We should have it ready
before the sun's down...
Come help me finish it.
I can hear fireworks being set off.

Perhaps there's a show
somewhere around here?
If it's close, maybe we can go see it.
Want to come with me?
How was it? Did you have fun?

There's so much you can do
at the ocean in summer.

No matter how long you spend there,
it's never enough.

It's a shame, but we can't play
around forever.

Let's take care of this Witch quickly
and get back to the beach.

The Mirror Labyrinth stays so cool
even in summer...
No, we didn't come here to cool off.
Let's continue our investigation.

It seems there's a place here
where you can do some diving.

I've dived at pools before, but this is
my first time diving at the ocean.
Want to join me?
Capture the Flag...?
I'll take part. I'm good at games like that.
I won't lo—

That's quite a large number of
defenders you have there.

There's something elegant about taking a
break under a beach umbrella,
sipping an ice-cold ramune soda.
There's a bottle here for you too, you know.

If you're tired from swimming, you could
always collect things that wash ashore.

Each piece of seashell or sea glass
is often unique.

W-wait, Felicia!
I know you can put your own
syrup on, but ALL of them?!
I swear...

Well, your shaved ice certainly
is colorful now.

Prepare yourself, Tsuruno.
You started this...
If you must blame someone, blame yourself.
...BANG!

I suppose water pistols
don't make that noise, but still.

I'm glad we found this hidden cove
where we can swim.
Sana might get jostled if there are crowds...

We came all this way, after all.
We want everyone to have a great time.
Strange... That shouldn't happen.

Humans usually float in water, 
so how come Iroha keeps sinking
every time she tries to swim?
A glamour photoshoot on the beach?
Hmm, I don't know about that.

I've never done one before,
and have no plans to in the future.
It's just not "me"...
